description:
This action generates an RSA key pair in JWK (JSON Web Key) format. It outputs:

- A public JWKS (JSON Web Key Set) for API use.

- A private JWKS for secure storage/use in your backend.

Useful for generating secure key material for JWT signing, OAuth2 clients, or other cryptographic use cases.

This action currently supports RSA algorithms only via the jose-node-cjs-runtime library.
name: JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) Generator
plugin_instructions:
Use the create JWKS action to generate the key set. 

Use this action to:

- Generate keys for JWT-based authentication.

- Configure OAuth2 / OpenID Connect clients with public keys.

- Rotate and manage keys dynamically via Bubble workflows.
